mapper.sql: dataset_id, dataset_name, dataset_generator, dataset_generate_time, dataset_config_filepath, dataset_nc_filepath
mapper.insert: insert into dh_dataset (dataset_id, dataset_name, dataset_generator, dataset_generate_time, dataset_config_filepath, dataset_nc_filepath) values (#{datasetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasetGenerator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasetGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datasetConfigFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasetNcFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dh_dataset
dataset_id,
dataset_name,
dataset_generator,
dataset_generate_time,
dataset_config_filepath,
dataset_nc_filepath,
#{datasetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasetGenerator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasetGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{datasetConfigFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datasetNcFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dh_dataset
dataset_name = #{datasetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dataset_generator = #{datasetGenerator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dataset_generate_time = #{datasetGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dataset_config_filepath = #{datasetConfigFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dataset_nc_filepath = #{datasetNcFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dataset_id = #{datasetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update dh_dataset set dataset_name = #{datasetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dataset_generator = #{datasetGenerator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dataset_generate_time = #{datasetGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dataset_config_filepath = #{datasetConfigFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dataset_nc_filepath = #{datasetNcFilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dataset_id = #{datasetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT dh_dataset.dataset_id, dh_dataset.dataset_name, dh_dataset.dataset_generate_time, userr.user_name nutrient_generator, dh_dataset.dataset_nc_filepath, IF ( isnull(publish1.published), FALSE, TRUE ) AS published, publish.publish_url, publish.publish_dataset_name FROM dh_dataset LEFT JOIN ( SELECT publish_resource_id, publish_url, publish_dataset_name FROM dh_publish ) publish ON dh_dataset.dataset_id = publish.publish_resource_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT publish_resource_id, publish_successful published FROM dh_publish WHERE publish_successful = 1 ) publish1 ON dh_dataset.dataset_id = publish1.publish_resource_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_name FROM sys_t_user ) userr ON dh_dataset.dataset_generator = userr.user_id ORDER BY dataset_generate_time DESC
